Compact form, structural indexing

Compact form, structural indexing

compact_indexes(x, ...)

# S3 method for SC
compact_indexes(x, ...)

# S3 method for PATH
compact_indexes(x, ...)

Arguments

x

input model
...

arguments passed to methods

Value

a special "compact_*" form, of e.g. SC, or PATH

Examples

compact_indexes(SC(minimal_mesh))
#> $object
#> # A tibble: 2 x 1
#>       a
#> * <int>
#> 1     1
#> 2     2
#> 
#> $object_link_edge
#> # A tibble: 16 x 2
#>    edge_ object_
#>    <int>   <int>
#>  1     1       1
#>  2     2       1
#>  3     3       1
#>  4     4       1
#>  5     5       1
#>  6     6       1
#>  7     7       1
#>  8     8       1
#>  9     9       1
#> 10    10       1
#> 11    11       1
#> 12    12       1
#> 13     6       2
#> 14    13       2
#> 15    14       2
#> 16    15       2
#>

#> # A tibble: 15 x 2
#>    .vertex0 .vertex1

#>  2        2        3

#>  4        4        5

#>
